1468980.name: ALIEN ANIMALS Demo
1468980.description:
Come join us in Alien Animals: Sandbox! Play as an astronaut in this 2D block-building sandbox game. Explore, obtain items, build houses with blocks, paint and animate anything you want! Fight and defend houses by deploying alien blocks! Lots of fun activities with Alien Animals. Share your creations with friends and let them all join in and feel the fun!



Build houses for Alien Animals to keep them safe from the Virus attacks. Gather raw block materials and use various tools to place, edit, color, or remove the blocks. Design alien-style houses, fill the rooms with furniture and decorations; but remember, each alien race has its own housing requirements.



Fight Virus pawns and defeat powerful bosses, bring an end to their invasion! Remember to be cautious when fighting bosses as they can mutate and call more pawns! Recruit the Summonimals and call them for help in a fight against Virus bosses! Obtain battle items from the Angelimals!



Meet and interact with friendly Alien Animals. Collect, cooperate or compete with them! Use your skill and earn rewards. Catch alien fishes, sweep clouds with Angelimal, kite race, water alien berries, and many more!



The choice of items is not enough for you? Want to make something that only you own? Then, use the Paint and Animate feature! Create your own blocks, paint anything. Bring your imagination to life with some cool animations.



Made from special essences that give life to normal blocks, these are the alien blocks! Deploy them to guard your houses. Each of them has different powers and attack styles.
1468980.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
